wikipedia_page.main: Air Vice Marshal Clayton Descou Clement Boyce  (19 September 1907 – 20 December 1987) was a senior Royal Air Force (RAF) officer.

link_mentions.page: List of people educated at Bedford School
response: *Air Vice-Marshal Clayton Boyce CB CBE (1907–1987), Secretary General of Allied Air Forces, Central Europe, 1953–1954, Air Officer Commanding, Cyprus and the Levant, 1954–1956
